remarks: Transitive law for ordering on extended reals.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.)
statement:
xrlttrd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR* ) $.
xrlttrd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR* ) $.
xrlttrd.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR* ) $.
xrlttrd.4 $e |- ( ph -> A < B ) $.
xrlttrd.5 $e |- ( ph -> B < C ) $.
xrlttrd $p |- ( ph -> A < C ) $.
